tasks.title: Complete Initial B1 Assessment

tasks.title: Set Up Daily Practice Routine Structure

tasks.details: Create a sustainable daily practice schedule: Mon/Wed/Fri for grammar (45 min), Tue/Thu for vocabulary (30 min), Saturday for writing (1h30), Sunday for immersion. Set up reminders and tracking system.
tasks.testStrategy: Follow routine for one week and assess adherence. Adjust timing if needed.

tasks.title: Create Error Tracking System

tasks.details: Design an error log to track: error type, frequency, context, correction, and date. Focus on SI clauses, pronoun order, and conjugation errors. Include review mechanism.

tasks.title: Tense Concordance Training

tasks.title: Argumentative Writing Structure

tasks.details: Learn introduction-development-conclusion structure. Practice thesis statements, linking words, and counter-arguments. Weekly 250-word essays on controversial topics.
tasks.testStrategy: Write 4 argumentative essays scoring 15/20 or higher on B2 criteria.

tasks.title: Film Immersion Without Subtitles

tasks.details: Watch one French film weekly without subtitles. Take notes on plot, new expressions, and comprehension gaps. Discuss in speaking practice.

tasks.title: Complex Oral Production Topics
tasks.description: Practice B2-level speaking topics with sophisticated arguments
tasks.details: Prepare 3-minute presentations on abstract topics: environment, technology, society. Use complex structures and varied vocabulary. Record and evaluate on 20-point scale.
tasks.testStrategy: Achieve 16/20 or higher on 5 different B2 oral topics.

tasks.title: Mock B2 Exam Practice
tasks.description: Complete full-length B2 practice exams under timed conditions

tasks.title: Speed and Fluency Optimization

tasks.details: Timed exercises for rapid response. Speaking: 5-minute impromptu topics. Writing: 250 words in 30 minutes. Focus on automatic language production.
tasks.testStrategy: Speak 5 minutes without major hesitation. Write 250 words in 30 minutes with <5 errors.

tasks.title: Final B2 Preparation Strategy
tasks.description: Intensive review and final exam preparation
tasks.details: Review all persistent errors. Practice exam strategies. Mental preparation and stress management. Final mock exams with full conditions.
tasks.testStrategy: Consistent 18/20 or higher on all skill areas in practice exams.
